Class ThreadSafeMessageQueue<T extends Message>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ThreadSafeMessageQueue<T>
public class ThreadSafeMessageQueue<T extends Message> extends Object
Wrapper around ArrayBlockingQueue with a ExecutorService tied to it, allowing for asyncronous inserts and takes.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    dump()
    Clears the entire contents of the queue.

    insert(T item)
    Inserts an item asynchronously into the back of the queue.
    T
    take()

  • Constructor Details

    • ThreadSafeMessageQueue

      public ThreadSafeMessageQueue(int size)
      Constructs a new Queue object and initializes the ExecutorService tied to it.
      Parameters:
      size - Size of the underlying ArrayBlockingQueue.

  • Method Details

    • take

      public T take() throws InterruptedException
      Retrieves the head of the queue, waiting until it's available.
      Returns:
      Head of the queue.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting.

    • insert

      public void insert(T item)
      Inserts an item asynchronously into the back of the queue.
      Parameters:
      item - Item to be inserted.

    • dump

      public void dump()
      Clears the entire contents of the queue.
